Reviews.Title: Looks good on first view
Reviews.Author: luee
Reviews.Content: Windows 8 has been neutralized with a free program. With a start and shut down button and no flying tiles the unit seems to work well. Still disappointed with MS, dropped a lot starting with the very good media center with junk in return. Downloaded VLC.The first thing I noticed about this unit was the keyboard, best I have ever used. Large responsive island keys with a light pewter colored border. I am downloading a ton of stuff with no freeze or hiccups so far. Had to install the latest Adobe flash. Good at multitasking, did a big heavy test run. Jump up for me from my dead Compaq 61 AMD dual core. Quite a difference from returned underpowered Asus. Uh oh, slight freeze on NBC replay of AGT. Great price on i3, even previous generation.

Reviews.Title: Not Bad for a PC
Reviews.Author: lotusgreen
Reviews.Content: Okay -- I am at heart a Mac person. But Macs have priced themselves out of my market, or I have fallen below theirs. This is a whole lot of machine for the price; it is also a whole lot of openings for malware. This is a word you learn when you have a pc. On the other hand, it's fun to be able to interact with the internet speedily. I also like the wide screen.From my experience, most if not all telephone and online Microsoft support is frighteningly bad; their training seems to have been to make the customer calm and optimistic.... and then rip their hearts out.

Reviews.Title: Good except for Windows 8
Reviews.Author: AC500Driver
Reviews.Content: Windows 8 sucks beyond what mere words can describe, but using Classic Shell at least make this computer usable. If you can load W7, this I might recommend this machine.

Reviews.Title: returned before receiving
Reviews.Author: Stephen Johnson
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my girlfriend it's a gift for Christmas, and before it arrived she happen to mention to me in conversation that she does not want a laptop. So quickly I hit the returned item button and the seller turned it around midship with no questions asked. They were great, with excellent customer service and I would purchase from them again and again and plan to in the future when I replace my laptop.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money. Spend a little more.
Reviews.Author: tpen007 "tpen007"
Reviews.Content: I expect a laptop to be slow after a year or so but not when it is new. This is so much slower then the two year old laptop I replaced with this. The mouse touchpad is so sensitive it goes to another page every time I try to use the touchpad. The only reason I gave it two stars and not one is you can only expect so much from a laptop in this price range.

Reviews.Title: best ever
Reviews.Author: keenan
Reviews.Content: start fast and stay fast. Love the windows 8 by the way. Best windows yet. Definitely recommend it for anyone.
